#summary Hello World - Script Style.

= Hello World =

This hello world example demonstrates how a script template looks when all the template and code are in the same script.

*helloworld.gsp*

{{{
<% 
	import java.text.SimpleDateFormat

	def message = 'Hello World'
	def sdf = new SimpleDateFormat('MMMM dd, yyyy')
	
	def today = sdf.format(new Date())
%>

<html>
	<head>
		<title>Hello World Example</title>
	</head>
	<body>
		$message, today is $today
	</body>
</html>
}}}
